column1: ... even if positive coronavirus tests occur among players and staff? This is Incredible!
And please Madrid, beware of Coronavirus

Coronavirus is in town and hand sanitizers are flying off pharmacy shelves, let's keep this energy after now biko. So it doesn't end like every other thing. High alert for a few days, and then we forget about it. Be alert! StayProtected! StaySafe! #CoVid19
